subject: Simsonn manager High CPU 10-20%
description_text:
Hi

Could you please explain why Simsonn manager is using so much CPU?

Is this normal? How can I disable all the animations and adverts in the
app? I need to make the app as light as possible.


[image: 028df64f-2277-4f21-bb1f-569a4df3c50b.png]
Please advise

Thanks
Lindell

conversations.body_text: Hi Lindell Harry,  Please provide your order number and specify which pedal model you are using, as well as whether you are using a VAM haptic motor. If you are not using a haptic motor, you can close the SIMSONN Manager software after calibration.

Hi ,

Order is for pedals SSN1672 - Plus X pedals, added haptics with order
number SSN2194. I use Simhub to control the haptics but this is not ideal?


Thanks

Lindell

On Thu, 25 Dec 2025 at 03:56, service@simsonn.com

Hi Lindell Harry,     Our engineers have optimized the performance. Please check whether the CPU usage is still high.    https://drive.google.com/file/d/1C_HvWFW6g-Nw7AXxFZw3NhPT5zjHOjTj/view?usp=drivesdk

Hi,

Thank you for the update. The performance is much better now, though CPU
usage remains between 0-5% even when the app is minimized. I am still
unclear on what is driving that usage, so I agree it is best to close the
software while gaming since it is not required.

While I have this ticket open, I would like to suggest an improvement
regarding the splash screen. Currently, the "always on top" logo appears
for about 15 seconds every time the app launches. If I need to make a quick
adjustment to my pedals during a race, this prevents me from seeing
anything else on my screen. It would be very helpful if there were an
option to disable the splash screen or have the app launch in the
background.

Best regards,

Lindell

On Fri, 26 Dec 2025 at 22:40, service@simsonn.com
Hi Lindell Harry,  I will report this issue to the software team for improvement.
